Plot: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.
Title: Hall Pass
Actors: Owen Wilson, Jason Sudeikis, Jenna Fischer, Christina Applegate
Writer: Pete Jones (screenplay), Peter Farrelly (screenplay), Kevin Barnett (screenplay), Bobby Farrelly (screenplay), Pete Jones (story)
